g.text: SNS User
Nurse
NurseHCC
Center Coordinator
Receptionist
ReceptionistHCC
Administrator
UC01: Schedule vaccination
UC02: Request EU COVID Digital Certificate
UC03: Authorize the DGS to send SMS message
with information about appointment
UC04: Register the arrival of a SNS user to take the vaccine
UC05: Schedule a vaccine for a user
UC06: Confirm that the SNS user has the vaccine scheduled
UC07: Record adverse reactions of a SNS user
UC08: Record the administration of a vaccine to a SNS user
UC09: Check the list of SNS users that are
present in the vaccination center
UC010: Check the user info and health conditions
UC011: Issue and deliver vaccination certificate for SNS user
UC012: Specify a new vaccine type
UC013: Specify a new vaccine and its administration process
UC014: Register centers, SNS users,
center coordinators, receptionists and nurses
UC015: Get instructions regarding the vaccine to be administered
UC016: Register the vaccine type, brand and lot number
UC017: Monitor the vaccination process
UC018: Evaluate the performance
of the vaccination process
UC019: Analyse reports concerning vaccination process
